user.description: Set required parameters to connect to your camera. For more information, please refer to the [integration documentation]({doc_url})

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Vivotek using camera platform YAML configuration is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, Home Assistant could not connect to the device. Please review the configuration and the connection to the camera, then restart Home Assistant to try again, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: Vivotek YAML configuration deprecated

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Vivotek using camera platform YAML configuration is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, an unknown error occurred. Please restart Home Assistant to try again, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: [%key:component::vivotek::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_connect::title%]
